item.title: Crispy Pork Belly
item.description: Toast the peppercorns and fennel seeds and grind up in the mortar and pestle along with salt and materfoods italian herbs.

item.title: Pork & Pineapple Tacos
item.description: Marinade the pork and pineapple wedges and chuck em on the BBQ.

item.title: Pork Apple & Carrot
item.description: Pork Fillet with the apple sauce and orange carrots

item.title: Pulled Pork Tacos
item.description: Ingredients # Taco # Ingredient Slow Cooked Pork Texas Slaw (altered) Pickled Red Onions Cabbage Baby Spinach Chipotle Sauce Tortillas Tasty Cheese Texas Slaw # This is usually a side dish on its own but since there’s pickled red onions and cabbage in the taco we will leave them out of the slaw
